name: Werebear
movement: 30 feet in humanoid form; 40 feet and climbing 30 feet in bear or hybrid form
description: A humanoid cursed to transform into a massive bear, either fully or in a hybrid form, with thick fur and powerful claws.
memorable: Can transmit lycanthropy through its bite and immune to non-silvered weapons.
goals: To guard its territory and protect allies.
relations: Associated with other lycanthropes and bears.
strengths: Exceptional physical strength and resilience; has a Multiattack feature.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to silvered weapons and wolfsbane.
attacks: Can make two claw attacks, or use a greataxe in humanoid form, or a bite attack in bear form.
most_powerful_ability: Shapechanger - can transform into bear or hybrid form, maintaining its statistics.
senses: Has keen smell, granting it advantage on Perception checks that rely on smell.
skills: Has proficiency in Perception, with a +7 bonus in its hybrid forms.
additional_information: Can grapple opponents with claw attacks.
Curses humanoids bitten with werebear lycanthropy.
Heightened sensitivity to smell allowing exceptional tracking.
Can knock grappled creatures prone with a specialized pin maneuver.
Good at detecting hidden threats due to high passive perception.
test_queries: noble protector that turns into a bear
werebear with powerful claws and bites
humanoid that can transform into a bear
